text: How Tech Savvy do you consider yourself to be?
How familiar are you with generative AI technologies, such as ChatGPT?
Which Generative AI based tools do you regularly use in your work?
When have you started using those tools?
Was the use of AI tools suggested by your manager or was it your own idea?
Which tasks do you use generative AI for?
Which tasks do you not think generative AI tools are suitable for as part of your job?
What is your most common reaction toward generative AI's performance?
What are your main concerns regarding the use of AI in your work?
How would you describe your sentiment towards generative AI?
How are you currently upskilling or reskilling to adapt to the changing technological landscape?
Are you concerned about any ethical issues with respect to the use of generative AI in the workplace?
What is the impact of AI on productivity of employees in the new age?
What should society do to prepare for the impact of AI and automation on the job market?
options: Invest in education and training programs
Implement policies to support workers affected by job displacement
Encourage ethical AI development and deployment
Promote international cooperation on AI governance

text: Do you believe that governments are doing enough to address the challenges and opportunities presented by AI?
How is your organization adapting to the rise of AI and automation?
What role should businesses play in addressing the societal challenges posed by AI?
Should AI continue to be developed?
